main event: A witness reported seeing a disc-shaped object hovering in the sky for a few minutes before suddenly disappearing on April 3, 1961 in Hialeah, Florida.
interesting points: The object was considered possibly being an aircraft, but no further evaluation was indicated.
Another witness described seeing a bright, disc-shaped object appear in the sky and then suddenly disappear on April 25, 1961.
The witness and their friend called a neighbor who also saw the object.
The witness was sure they saw a flying saucer, though the government concluded it was likely an aircraft sighting.
The witness had additional questions about the nature and origin of flying saucers.
witnesses: multiple witnesses, including a farmer and neighbors
